title: Mechanical Glove
summaries: The Mechanical Glove is a Hardmode accessory that doubles all melee weapons' knockback, and increases melee damage and speed by 12%. On [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, [img:Mobile version] Mobile, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader, it is only available after defeating all mechanical bosses.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Mechanical Glove enables autoswing for all melee weapons and whips and increases their size by 10%.
